Jul 5, 2023 | Pilot #1 invitation

The invitation for the 1st Palantir project pilot is now available for downloading.

Mar 23, 2023 | Newsletter #6

The sixth PALANTIR’s newsletter has been published:

Dec 23, 2022 | Newsletter #5

The fifth PALANTIR’s newsletter has been published:

Dec 23, 2022 | Leaflet #5

Take a look at the new PALANTIR leaflet on Hybrid Threat Intelligence.

Sep 14, 2022 | PALANTIR cybersecurity webinar and demonstration

The PALANTIR project aims to provide accessible cybersecurity services to SMEs/MEs that may lack the means of larger enterprises.

Jul 14, 2022 | Leaflet #4

Take a look at the new PALANTIR leaflet on Threat Management and Sharing.

May 26, 2022 | Newsletter #4

The fourth PALANTIR’s newsletter has been published:

May 23, 2022 | PALANTIR project public event

PALANTIR aims at bridging the gap between large enterprises and SMEs/MEs, by providing multi-layered, infrastructure-wide threat monitoring, cyber-resiliency and knowledge sharing in a heterogeneous ecosystem, while at the same time being able to market these services to third parties in the form of Security-as-a-service (SECaaS).

May 16, 2022 | Leaflet #3

Take a look at the new PALANTIR leaflet on Secure Services.

Mar 10, 2022 | Newsletter #3

The third PALANTIR’s newsletter has been published:

Jan 18, 2022 | Newsletter #2

The second PALANTIR’s newsletter has been published:

Take a look at the innovation and results of PALANTIR project.

Jul 23, 2021 | Newsletter #1

The first PALANTIR’s newsletter has been published:

Jul 23, 2021 | Leaflet #1

Scope and motivation of PALANTIR project.

Jul 13, 2021 | Achieving practical cybersecurity for SMEs/MEs with PALANTIR | EuCNC 2021 presentation

PALANTIR project has been presented at EuCNC 2021 Virtual Conference.

Mar 25, 2021 | PALANTIR co-organises Secure Future Networks Special Session

PALANTIR co-organises the Secure Future Networks Special Session, is co-hosted at the 1st IEEE International Mediterranean Conference on Communications and Networking (IEEE MeditCom) that will be held from July 5 to July 8, 2021, in Athens, Greece.

Feb 22, 2021 | PALANTIR co-organises the 3rd IEEE SecSoft

PALANTIR co-organises the 3rd International Workshop on Cyber-Security Threats, Trust and Privacy Management in Software-defined and Virtualized Infrastructures (SecSoft).

Feb 17, 2021 | 1st General Assembly Meeting of PALANTIR

The 1st General Assembly Meeting of PALANTIR was realized on the 9th of February.

Dec 11, 2020 | PALANTIR project supports SMEs/MEs in cybersecurity

September 1st, 2020 marked the official start of PALANTIR, a cybersecurity focused project funded by the H2020 Programme.

This project has received funding from the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under grant agreement No 883335.
